mapper.update: UPDATE kb_user_registration SET email=#{email}, name=#{name} WHERE id=#{id} AND delete_status=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_user_registration WHERE delete_status=0 and email= #{email}
SELECT * FROM kb_user_registration WHERE delete_status=0 and phone= #{phone}
SELECT * FROM kb_user_registration WHERE delete_status=0 and name= #{name}
SELECT id,email,NAME,salt FROM kb_user_registration WHERE delete_status=0 and (email=#{identity} or name=#{identity})
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_user_registration SET delete_status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM kb_user_registration WHERE name=#{email} AND delete_status=0
SELECT count(*) FROM kb_user_registration WHERE email=#{email} AND delete_status=0
SELECT id,email,NAME FROM kb_user_registration WHERE delete_status=0 and (email=#{identity} or name=#{identity}) AND kb_user_registration.password=#{password}

SELECT registration.name as userName,registration.email,profile.nick_name as nickName,profile.avatar as avatar FROM kb_user_profile profile LEFT JOIN kb_user_registration registration ON profile.user_name=registration.name WHERE profile.user_name=#{userName} AND registration.delete_status=0 AND profile.delete_status=0
